procurement_category: Infrastructure - Construction or Rehabilitation of Buildings
short_summary: Kingston Rideau Canal Kingston Mills Locks 46-49 Rehabilitation
description: Kingston RidAMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:  Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on November 03, 2022 by 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM  EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Real Property Branch requires a qualified general contractor for Kingston Mills Locks 46-49 Rehabilitation Rideau Canal Kingston Ontario. There will be an optional site visit on October 12, 2022 at 10:00 AM EDT. Interested Bidders are to meet at the site, Kingston Mills. Bidders are requested to register with the Contracting Officer, Sheila Dhanna at sheila.dhanna@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca to confirm their attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend 24 hours prior to the site visit. The Contractor must perform and complete the Work by May 20, 2024.
tags: Infrastructure - Construction or Rehabilitation of Buildings
